name: Patchwork Kingdom #527 | Tilvision
description: The twin kingdoms of Tilvision, separated by a digital divide. A bustling kingdom of 125 schools on top that are all connected to the internet, and 114 schools, not connected, hidden in the upside down kingdom | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
